data.claim: Visual Hierarchy - 8 Factors: 1) Size - larger = more attention. 2) Color - bright before muted, dark before gray. 3) Contrast - stark differences direct eye. 4) Alignment - organized creates priority. 5) Repetition - consistency signals relationship; breaking pattern grabs attention. 6) Proximity - close = related; space = separate. 7) Whitespace - frames and emphasizes, aids scanning. 8) Texture/Style - distinct treatments prioritize. Eye patterns: Z-pattern for minimal pages, F-pattern for text-heavy. Users form opinions in 50ms.
